original_title: Da Boca Da Noite À Barra Do Dia
overview: In Pernambuco's Zona da Mata, dream and reality are mixed. Among the cane fields, the colors, dances, theater and music reveal a not-so-distant past that calls into question the present and sheds light on the future challenges of a game that starts at night and ends at daylight.
title: Da Boca Da Noite À Barra Do Dia
